link_desc:
• Oracle 10, 11, 12, 18, 19 RAC and single instance databases
  • Oracle primary and standby databases
  • Oracle asm instances
  • Oracle plugin/multitenant databases
  • postgres 9, 10, 11, 12 primary and slave
  • SQL Server 2008(10), 2012(11), 2016(13) always on
  • db2 v 10
  • mysql 5, 8
  • cockroachDB 2

A very simple but advanced monitoring solution for databases using python3 and the respective database driver[s]. It runs on a client machine so no extra software needed on the database server needed. Should be able to monitor any SQL database that has the monitoring data available for SQL and a python driver.

Written with kiss and low overhead in mind.

Adding support for new database[s] and version[s] is a very straight forward.

see https://github.com/ikzelf/zbxdb

Even Oracle Database Auto Discovery and Oracle alertly monitoring is included.

Not tested but of the driver supports Oracle 7, it should work from Oracle v7 up to the latest versions.

Currently db2 is missing .... Who can help me to fix that?
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent Active|Zabbix Trapper|Database Monitor|SSH|Custom Script
tags: Oracle, postgres, mssql, mysql, cockroachDB, python
author: Ronald Rood
